name: Black Beans
properties: Part of Daily Dozen - 3 servings of legumes daily
Excellent source of vitamins, minerals, fiber and antioxidants
Benefits excess body weight and insulin resistance
High in antioxidants from dark color
Versatile in salads and main dishes
benefits: Black beans are an excellent source of vitamins, minerals, fiber and antioxidants. Their dark color indicates high antioxidant content. They benefit excess body weight, insulin resistance, high cholesterol, inflammation, and oxidative stress, making them an important part of heart disease prevention and weight loss.
amount: Part of 3 daily servings of legumes (Daily Dozen)

quotes: Favourite flavours of the Southwest combine in this hearty main-dish salad starring kale and black beans.
